summary: Daedric armour for those of you who live on the darker side of life.
descriptionHtml:
Simply makes the daedric armour suit darker, the way i always thought it would be, as i have always seen it to be a demonic suit, i think this gives it a more evil and essentially \'\'darker\" look.

It can be forged as usual and upgraded.. does not interfere with the games original daedric suit.. 

The full suit can be found in Qasmoke..

I increased all the texture resolutions from the original ones hence the larger file size..
author: xooki3
